title: Great Location at Fishermans Wharf
text: Close to Ghiradelli Square and cable car turnabout. Wonderful old brick building. The rooms were quiet and the beds and linen were very good. Parking is $40 but 25% discount if you have a hybrid. At the rental desk you get another discoun for Hybrids so a good deal there as well.  We booked an inside room but they upgraded us to an outside room and had a partial view of the Golden Gate bridge,
